languages.text: "Я бы не назвал это проблемой, стоящей внимания {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Нижние палубы, случается, бунтуют. Лет тридцать тому назад у нас там даже возник целый революционный лидер, подбивавший установить власть рабочих на всем корабле. Месяц порядок наводили и еще лет восемь после боролись со слухами, что тот "герой" пережил казнь и вот-вот снова соберет людей на борьбу с тиранией". {n}Абеляр хмыкает.{/n} "Впрочем, это досужее. Если говорить о нынешней ситуации — у нас достаточно блюстителей, чтобы с ней справляться".

traits.locale_text: "Я бы не назвал это проблемой, стоящей внимания {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Нижние палубы, случается, бунтуют. Лет тридцать тому у нас там даже возник целый революционный лидер, подбивавший установить власть рабочих на всем корабле. Месяц порядок наводили и еще лет восемь после боролись со слухами, что тот "герой" пережил казнь и вот-вот снова соберет людей на борьбу с тиранией". {n}Абеляр хмыкает.{/n} "Впрочем, это досужее. Если говорить о нынешней ситуации — у нас достаточно стражи, чтобы с ней справляться".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "I would not deem it a problem worthy of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s attention. The lower decks, as it so happens, are in revolt. Thirty-some years ago, we even had a revolutionary leader rise up who dared to establish workers' rule across the entire ship. It took a month to restore order, but even eight years later, we were still battling rumours that the 'hero' had survived his execution and was on the verge of gathering people to fight against tyranny once more." {n}Abelard scoffs.{/n} "Needless to say, the rumours were baseless. As for the current situation, we have sufficient enforcers to deal with it."
languages.original_text: "Я бы не назвал это проблемой, стоящей внимания {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Нижние палубы, случается, бунтуют. Лет тридцать тому назад у нас там даже возник целый революционный лидер, подбивавший установить власть рабочих на всем корабле. Месяц порядок наводили и еще лет восемь после боролись со слухами, что тот "герой" пережил казнь и вот-вот снова соберет людей на борьбу с тиранией". {n}Абеляр хмыкает.{/n} "Впрочем, это досужее. Если говорить о нынешней ситуации — у нас достаточно блюстителей, чтобы с ней справляться".

Thirty-some years ago, we even had a revolutionary leader rise up who dared to establish workers' rule across the entire ship. It took a month to restore order, but even eight years later, we were still battling rumours that the 'hero' had survived his execution and was on the verge of gathering people to fight against tyranny once more." {n}Abelard scoffs.{/n} "Needless to say, the rumours were baseless. As for the current situation, we have sufficient enforcers to deal with it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我认为这样的问题并不值得{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}关注。正如您所说，底层甲板正在发生叛乱。三十多年前，这艘船上甚至出现了一位叛军领袖，打算让工人成为整艘船的统治阶级。我们花了一个月的时间，才恢复了秩序。可过了八年之后，我们依然在忙于处理底层甲板的谣言。他们说那位‘英雄’并没有遭到处决。蛰伏多年之后，他准备再次将人们聚集起来，与暴政作斗争。”{n}阿贝拉德嘲笑道。{/n}“自不必说，这些传言毫无根据。至于目前的状况，我们有足够的执法者来处理。”
languages.original_text: "I would not deem it a problem worthy of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s attention. The lower decks, as it so happens, are in revolt. Thirty-some years ago, we even had a revolutionary leader rise up who dared to establish workers' rule across the entire ship. It took a month to restore order, but even eight years later, we were still battling rumours that the 'hero' had survived his execution and was on the verge of gathering people to fight against tyranny once more." {n}Abelard scoffs.{/n} "Needless to say, the rumours were baseless. As for the current situation, we have sufficient enforcers to deal with it."

traits.locale_text: “我认为这样的问题并不值得{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}关注。正如您所说，底层甲板正在发生叛乱。三十多年前，这艘船上甚至出现了一位叛军领袖，打算让工人成为整艘船的统治阶级。我们花了一个月的时间，才恢复了秩序。可过了八年之后，我们依然在忙于处理底层甲板的谣言。他们说那位‘英雄’并没有遭到处决。蛰伏多年之后，他准备再次将人们聚集起来，与暴政作斗争。”{n}阿贝拉德嘲笑道。{/n}“自不必说，这些传言毫无根据。至于目前的状况，我们有足够的镇压者来处理。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No considero que el problema merezca la atención de{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Efectivamente, las cubiertas inferiores siempre se están rebelando. Hace treinta y algo años, hasta tuvimos un líder revolucionario que se atrevió a instaurar el gobierno de los trabajadores en toda la nave. Tardamos un mes en restaurar el orden y ocho años después seguíamos sofocando rumores de que este "héroe" había sobrevivido a su ejecución y estaba reuniendo fuerzas para hacer frente a la tiranía una vez más». {n}Abelard se burla.{/n} «Claramente, los rumores eran infundados. En cuanto a la situación actual, tenemos personal suficiente para contenerla».
languages.original_text: "I would not deem it a problem worthy of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s attention. The lower decks, as it so happens, are in revolt. Thirty-some years ago, we even had a revolutionary leader rise up who dared to establish workers' rule across the entire ship. It took a month to restore order, but even eight years later, we were still battling rumours that the 'hero' had survived his execution and was on the verge of gathering people to fight against tyranny once more." {n}Abelard scoffs.{/n} "Needless to say, the rumours were baseless. As for the current situation, we have sufficient enforcers to deal with it."

traits.locale_text: «No considero que el problema merezca la atención de{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Efectivamente, las cubiertas inferiores siempre se están rebelando. Hace treinta y algo años, hasta tuvimos un líder revolucionario que se atrevió a instaurar el gobierno de los trabajadores en toda la nave. Tardamos un mes en restaurar el orden y ocho años después seguíamos sofocando rumores de que este "héroe" había sobrevivido a su ejecución y estaba reuniendo fuerzas para hacer frente a la tiranía una vez más». {n}Abelard se burla.{/n} «Claramente, los rumores eran infundados. En cuanto a la situación actual, tenemos personal suficiente para contenerla».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}が注意を払うに値する問題とは思えません。下層デッキでの反乱など、しばしばあることです。30数年前、船全体の労働者支配を確立しようとする革命的指導者が立ち上がったこともあります。秩序を取り戻すのに1カ月かかりましたが、8年経った今でも、その『英雄』が処刑を免れ、再び専制政治と戦うために人々を集めようとしているという噂と戦っているのです」{n}アベラルドは嘲笑する。{/n}「言うまでもなく、その噂は根拠のないものでした。現状に関しては、我々には十分なエンフォーサーもいます」
languages.original_text: "I would not deem it a problem worthy of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s attention. The lower decks, as it so happens, are in revolt. Thirty-some years ago, we even had a revolutionary leader rise up who dared to establish workers' rule across the entire ship. It took a month to restore order, but even eight years later, we were still battling rumours that the 'hero' had survived his execution and was on the verge of gathering people to fight against tyranny once more." {n}Abelard scoffs.{/n} "Needless to say, the rumours were baseless. As for the current situation, we have sufficient enforcers to deal with it."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}が注意を払うに値する問題とは思えません。下層デッキでの反乱など、しばしばあることです。30数年前、船全体の労働者支配を確立しようとする革命的指導者が立ち上がったこともあります。秩序を取り戻すのに1カ月かかりましたが、8年経った今でも、その『英雄』が処刑を免れ、再び専制政治と戦うために人々を集めようとしているという噂と戦っているのです」{n}アベラルドは嘲笑する。{/n}「言うまでもなく、その噂は根拠のないものでした。現状に関しては、我々には十分なエンフォーサーもいます」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich würde das nicht als Problem ansehen, dass der Aufmerksamkeit {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}{/g} würdig ist. Auf den Unterdecks findet eine Revolte statt, gut. Vor etwas über dreißig Jahren erhob sich sogar einmal ein revolutionärer Anführer, der es wagte, auf dem gesamten Schiff eine Herrschaft der Arbeiter zu etablieren. Es dauerte einen Monat, die Ordnung wiederherzustellen, doch noch acht Jahre später kämpften wir gegen Gerüchte, der "Held" habe seine Hinrichtung überlebt und stehe kurz davor, wieder Arbeiter um sich zu scharen, um gegen die Tyrannei aufzugebehren." {n}Abelard schnaubt verächtlich auf.{/n} "Die Gerüchte waren natürlich vollkommen haltlos. Was die momentane Lage angeht, wir haben ausreichend Enforcers, die sich darum kümmern."
languages.original_text: "I would not deem it a problem worthy of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s attention. The lower decks, as it so happens, are in revolt. Thirty-some years ago, we even had a revolutionary leader rise up who dared to establish workers' rule across the entire ship. It took a month to restore order, but even eight years later, we were still battling rumours that the 'hero' had survived his execution and was on the verge of gathering people to fight against tyranny once more." {n}Abelard scoffs.{/n} "Needless to say, the rumours were baseless. As for the current situation, we have sufficient enforcers to deal with it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde das nicht als Problem ansehen, dass der Aufmerksamkeit {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}{/g} würdig ist. Auf den Unterdecks findet eine Revolte statt, gut. Vor etwas über dreißig Jahren erhob sich sogar einmal ein revolutionärer Anführer, der es wagte, auf dem gesamten Schiff eine Herrschaft der Arbeiter zu etablieren. Es dauerte einen Monat, die Ordnung wiederherzustellen, doch noch acht Jahre später kämpften wir gegen Gerüchte, der "Held" habe seine Hinrichtung überlebt und stehe kurz davor, wieder Arbeiter um sich zu scharen, um gegen die Tyrannei aufzugebehren." {n}Abelard schnaubt verächtlich auf.{/n} "Die Gerüchte waren natürlich vollkommen haltlos. Was die momentane Lage angeht, wir haben ausreichend Enforcers, die sich darum kümmern."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ces enfantillages sont indignes de l'intérêt d'{mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/g}. Le vent de révolte qui souffle sur les ponts inférieurs n'a rien de nouveau. Il y a trente ans de cela, un rebelle a même réussi à fédérer les ouvriers avant de prendre le contrôle de l'ensemble du vaisseau. Un mois plus tard, tout était rentré dans l'ordre, mais huit ans après, nous étions toujours confrontés à des rumeurs selon lesquels le "héros" avait échappé à son exécution et s'apprêtait à reprendre le combat contre la tyrannie du haut commandement. » {n}Abélard s'esclaffe.{/n} « Inutile de préciser que lesdites rumeurs étaient totalement infondées. Quant à la situation actuelle, nous avons largement assez de prévôts pour y remédier. »
languages.original_text: "I would not deem it a problem worthy of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s attention. The lower decks, as it so happens, are in revolt. Thirty-some years ago, we even had a revolutionary leader rise up who dared to establish workers' rule across the entire ship. It took a month to restore order, but even eight years later, we were still battling rumours that the 'hero' had survived his execution and was on the verge of gathering people to fight against tyranny once more." {n}Abelard scoffs.{/n} "Needless to say, the rumours were baseless. As for the current situation, we have sufficient enforcers to deal with it."

traits.locale_text: « Ces enfantillages sont indignes de l'intérêt d'{mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/g}. Le vent de révolte qui souffle sur les ponts inférieurs n'a rien de nouveau. Il y a trente ans de cela, un rebelle a même réussi à fédérer les ouvriers avant de prendre le contrôle de l'ensemble du vaisseau. Un mois plus tard, tout était rentré dans l'ordre, mais huit ans après, nous étions toujours confrontés à des rumeurs selon lesquels le "héros" avait échappé à son exécution et s'apprêtait à reprendre le combat contre la tyrannie du haut commandement. » {n}Abélard s'esclaffe.{/n} « Inutile de préciser que lesdites rumeurs étaient totalement infondées. Quant à la situation actuelle, nous avons largement assez de prévôts pour y remédier. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Kanaatimce bu, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} dikkatine değer bir mesele değil. Alt güvertede bir ayaklanma yaşanıyorsa ne olmuş? Otuz küsur yıl önce devrimci bir lider, işçilerin geminin yönetimini ele alması için isyana kalkışmıştı. Düzeni tekrar kurmak aylar sürmüştü. Olaydan sekiz yıl sonra bile 'kahraman'ın idamdan kurtulup bir kez daha zulme karşı mücadele etmek için insanları bir araya getireceğine dair söylentiler dolaşıyordu." {n}Abelard dudak büküyor.{/n} "Söylentilerin asılsız olduğunu söylememe gerek yoktur, eminim. Eldeki hadiseye gelirsek de meseleyle ilgilenecek yeterli sayıda infazcımız bulunuyor."
languages.original_text: "I would not deem it a problem worthy of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s attention. The lower decks, as it so happens, are in revolt. Thirty-some years ago, we even had a revolutionary leader rise up who dared to establish workers' rule across the entire ship. It took a month to restore order, but even eight years later, we were still battling rumours that the 'hero' had survived his execution and was on the verge of gathering people to fight against tyranny once more." {n}Abelard scoffs.{/n} "Needless to say, the rumours were baseless. As for the current situation, we have sufficient enforcers to deal with it."

traits.locale_text: "Kanaatimce bu, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in dikkatine değer bir mesele değil. Alt güvertede bir ayaklanma yaşanıyorsa ne olmuş? Otuz küsür yıl önce devrimci bir lider, işçilerin gemi çapında yönetimi ele alması için bir isyan çıkarmaya kalkışmıştı. Düzeni tekrar kurmak aylar sürdü. Sekiz yıl sonra bile 'kahramanın' idamdan kurtulup bir kez daha zulme karşı mücadele etmek için insanları bir araya getireceğine dair söylentiler yayılıyordu." {n}Abelard dudak büküyor.{/n} "Söylentilerin asılsız olduğunu söylememe gerek yoktur, eminim. Mevcut durumda ise meseleyle ilgilenecek yeterli sayıda infazcımız bulunuyor."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
